steps.title: In the medical world, NPNC can mean â€œNo prenatal care.â€
steps.content: In the medical world, NPNC can mean â€œNo prenatal care.â€ NPNC might be used by doctors and other medical officials to mean â€œno prenatal care.â€ [12] X Research source It can also mean â€œNasal and Paranasal Cavityâ€ or â€œnon-penicillin and non-cephalosporin.â€ NPNC can also stand for the National Peripheral Neuropathy Community in Aloha, Oregon.
